widget.label: Magefan Blog Extension - Recent Blog Posts

parameter.name: title
parameter.label: Title
parameter.description: Please specify title you want to display on the frontend. You can leave it blank if necessary.

parameter.name: number_of_posts
parameter.label: Number of Posts
parameter.description: Please indicate number of recent posts you want to display. Leave blank to use predefined "Posts Per Page" value.

parameter.name: category_id
parameter.label: Posts Category
parameter.description: Leave blank to display posts from all categories.

parameter.name: tag_id
parameter.label: Posts Tag
parameter.description: Leave blank to display posts from all tags.

parameter.name: author_id
parameter.label: Posts Author
parameter.description: Leave blank to display posts from all authors.

parameter.name: from
parameter.label: Posts Publish Date From
parameter.description: Leave blank or use date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameter.name: to
parameter.label: Posts Publish Date To
parameter.description: Leave blank or use date format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameter.name: custom_template
parameter.label: Custom Template
parameter.description:
Leave blank to use default template Magefan_Blog::widget/recent.phtml.
Magefan_Blog::widget/recent_masonry.phtml template is also available out of the box.
